title: The Enforcer: Maverick
description: Becky Adams is living life one day at a time as best she can in a world gone crazy. Maverick Wilder had walked away from the woman he loved above everything. He had no choice. When their worlds collide, will true love heal a broken heart and a life altered beyond repair.*This book was previously published as part of the "Taming the Vampire" boxed set and has not been altered in any way
author: Teresa Gabelman
